roleset.name: (cause to) lose minerals

example.name: demineralize-v
example.text: Soda demineralizes the bones, teeth, and skin, robbing you of your highest beauty by eating up your minerals.
example.arg: robbing you of your highest beauty by eating up your minerals.

example.name: demineralization-n
example.text: The demineralization of sea water and brackish ground water is a problem of international interest.
example.arg: of sea water and brackish ground water

roleset.note: DEMINERALIZATION-N NOTES: Relation to verb-mineralize.01. (from demineralization.01-n)
